00032 #ifndef _ASTERISK_INDICATIONS_H
00033 #define _ASTERISK_INDICATIONS_H
00034 
00035 #include "asterisk/lock.h"
00036 
00037 /*! \brief Description is a series of tones of the format:
00038       [!]freq1[+freq2][/duration] separated by commas.  There
00039       are no spaces.  The sequence is repeated back to the 
00040       first tone description not preceeded by !. Duration is
00041       specified in milliseconds */
00042 struct ind_tone_zone_sound {
00043    struct ind_tone_zone_sound *next;   /*!< next element */
00044    const char *name;       /*!< Identifing name */
00045    const char *data;       /*!< Actual zone description */
00046 };
00047 
00048 struct ind_tone_zone {
00049    AST_RWLIST_ENTRY(ind_tone_zone) list;
00050    char country[5];           /*!< Country code */
00051    char alias[5];             /*!< is this an alias? */
00052    char description[40];            /*!< Description */
00053    int  nrringcadence;           /*!< # registered ringcadence elements */
00054    int *ringcadence;          /*!< Ring cadence */
00055    struct ind_tone_zone_sound *tones;     /*!< The known tones for this zone */
00056 };
00057 
00058 /*! \brief set the default tone country */
00059 int ast_set_indication_country(const char *country);
00060 
00061 /*! \brief locate tone_zone, given the country. if country == NULL, use the default country */
00062 struct ind_tone_zone *ast_get_indication_zone(const char *country);
00063 /*! \brief locate a tone_zone_sound, given the tone_zone. if tone_zone == NULL, use the default tone_zone */
00064 struct ind_tone_zone_sound *ast_get_indication_tone(const struct ind_tone_zone *zone, const char *indication);
00065 
00066 /*! \brief add a new country, if country exists, it will be replaced. */
00067 int ast_register_indication_country(struct ind_tone_zone *country);
00068 /*! \brief remove an existing country and all its indications, country must exist */
00069 int ast_unregister_indication_country(const char *country);
00070 /*! \brief add a new indication to a tone_zone. tone_zone must exist. if the indication already
00071  * exists, it will be replaced. */
00072 int ast_register_indication(struct ind_tone_zone *zone, const char *indication, const char *tonelist);
00073 /*! \brief remove an existing tone_zone's indication. tone_zone must exist */
00074 int ast_unregister_indication(struct ind_tone_zone *zone, const char *indication);
00075 
00076 /*! \brief Start a tone-list going */
00077 int ast_playtones_start(struct ast_channel *chan, int vol, const char* tonelist, int interruptible);
00078 /*! \brief Stop the tones from playing */
00079 void ast_playtones_stop(struct ast_channel *chan);
00080 
00081 /*! \brief support for walking through a list of indications */
00082 struct ind_tone_zone *ast_walk_indications(const struct ind_tone_zone *cur);
00083 
00084 #if 0
00085 extern struct ind_tone_zone *tone_zones;
00086 extern ast_mutex_t tzlock;
00087 #endif
00088 
00089 #endif /* _ASTERISK_INDICATIONS_H */
